function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases transmission in built environment due to close interactions and shared spaces.","Impact":"Potential widespread transmission of contagious diseases, leading to public health crisis and economic downturn.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, vaccination programs, and social distancing measures.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection systems, contactless technology, and smart building management systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and workers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Lack of ventilation and natural light in built environment leading to poor indoor air quality and mental health issues.","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory infections, mold growth, and poor mental well-being among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Installation of ventilation systems, air purifiers, and incorporation of biophilic design elements for natural light and green spaces.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air quality monitors, green walls, and skylights.","People":"Building occupants, particularly those with respiratory conditions and mental health concerns.","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and facility managers."}]}
